text: The 2019 WK League season was the 11th season of the WK League, the top division of women's football in South Korea. The regular season began on 15 April and ended on 31 October 2019. Incheon Hyundai Steel Red Angels were the Champions for the seventh successive season.. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
